title: Fish and bacon chowder
ingredients: ['3 rashers streaky bacon, chopped', '15g (1/2 oz) butter', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 large carrot, finely chopped', '1 vegetable stock cube', '450ml (3/4 pt) water', '60g (2 oz) long grain rice', '340g (12 oz) smoked haddock or cod, skinned and cut into chunks', '450ml (3/4 pt) milk', '60g (2 oz) frozen peas', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons cold water', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', 'fresh parsley, to garnish']
